item.title: 562 smelting codes base
item.dc:creator: @crowd1 crowd1
item.description:
@crowd1 wrote:

hi this is my firts tut and well im working on smithing on my server so sins i dint see any smiting codes around well were is a start for all
50% credit me (crowd)
50% credit to iSotonic -562-
and dint put xp on so edit them

	case 311: //smelt interface
		if (buttonId == 1) {
	 	if (!player.getInventory().contains(438, 1)) {//bronze
	 	if (!player.getInventory().contains(436, 1)) {
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need 1 tin ore and 1 copper ore to  Smelt bronze bar!");
			return;
			}
			if(player.getSkills().getLevel(13) < 1) {// LVL
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need a level of 1 Smithing to do this.");
			return;
			}
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(438, 1);
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(436, 1);
			player.animate(899);
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You smelt a bronze bar!.");
			player.getInventory().addItem(2349, 1);
			player.getSkills().addXp(13, 59);
		}

		if (buttonId == 2) {
		if (!player.getInventory().contains(668, 1)) {//Blurite
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need some ore to  Smelt blurite bar!");
			return;
			}
			if(player.getSkills().getLevel(13) < 8) {// LVL
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need a level of 8 Smithing to do this.");
			return;
			}
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(668, 1);
			player.animate(899);
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You smelt a blurite bar!.");
			player.getInventory().addItem(9467, 1);
			player.getSkills().addXp(13, 108);
		}

		if (buttonId == 3) {
		if (!player.getInventory().contains(440, 1)) {//Iron
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need some iron ore to  Smelt iron bar!");
			return;
			}
			if(player.getSkills().getLevel(13) < 15) {// LVL
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need a level of 15 Smithing to do this.");
			return;
			}
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(440, 1);
			player.animate(899);
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You smelt a iron bar!.");
			player.getInventory().addItem(2351, 1);
			player.getSkills().addXp(13, 108);
		} 
		if (buttonId == 4) {
		if (!player.getInventory().contains(442, 1)) {//Silver
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need some silver ore to  Smelt silver bar!");
			return;
			}


			if(player.getSkills().getLevel(13) < 20) {// LVL
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need a level of 20 Smithing to do this.");
			return;
			}
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(442, 1);
			player.animate(899);
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You smelt a silver bar!.");
			player.getInventory().addItem(2355, 1);
			player.getSkills().addXp(13, 108);
		}

		if (buttonId == 5) {
		if (!player.getInventory().contains(453, 2)) {//Steel
		if (!player.getInventory().contains(440, 1)) {
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need 2 coal ore and 1 iron to  Smelt a bar!");
			return;
			}
			if(player.getSkills().getLevel(13) < 30) {// LVL
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need a level of 30 Smithing to do this.");
			return;
			}
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(453, 2);
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(440, 1);
			player.animate(899);
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You smelt a steel bar!.");
			player.getInventory().addItem(2353, 1);//steel bar
			player.getSkills().addXp(13, 108);
			return;
		}

		if (buttonId == 6) {
		if (!player.getInventory().contains(444, 1)) {//Gold
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need some gold ore to  Smelt gold bar!");
			return;
			}
			if(player.getSkills().getLevel(13) < 40) {// LVL
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need a level of 40 Smithing to do this.");
			return;
			}
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(444, 1);
			player.animate(899);
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You smelt a gold bar!.");
			player.getInventory().addItem(2357, 1);
			player.getSkills().addXp(13, 108);
		}

		if (buttonId == 7) {
		if (!player.getInventory().contains(453, 4)) {//Mithril
		if (!player.getInventory().contains(447, 1)) {
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need 4 coal ore and 1 mithril ore to  Smelt mithril bar!");
			return;
			}
			if(player.getSkills().getLevel(13) < 50) {// LVL
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need a level of 50 Smithing to do this.");
			return;
			}
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(453, 4);
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(447, 1);
			player.animate(899);
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You smelt a steel bar!.");
			player.getInventory().addItem(2359, 1);
			player.getSkills().addXp(13, 108);
			return;
		}

		if (buttonId == 8) {
		if (!player.getInventory().contains(453, 6)) {//Adamant
		if (!player.getInventory().contains(453, 1)) {
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need 6 coal ore and 1 adamant to  Smelt adamant bar!");
			return;
			}
			if(player.getSkills().getLevel(13) < 70) {// LVL
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need a level of 70 Smithing to do this.");
			return;
			}
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(453, 6);
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(449, 1);
			player.animate(899);
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You smelt a steel bar!.");
			player.getInventory().addItem(2361, 1);
			player.getSkills().addXp(13, 108);
			return;
		}

		if (buttonId == 9) {
		if (!player.getInventory().contains(453, 8)) {//Runite
		if (!player.getInventory().contains(451, 1)) {
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need 8 coal ore and 1 runite ore to  Smelt rune bar!");
			return;
			}
			if(player.getSkills().getLevel(13) < 85) {// LVL
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need a level of 85 Smithing to do this.");
			return;
			}
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(453, 8);
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(451, 1);
			player.animate(899);
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You smelt a steel bar!.");
			player.getInventory().addItem(2363, 1);
			player.getSkills().addXp(13, 108);
			break;
}

got the good emot and good smiting interface
so now work out the rest

Read full topic
